must_include: Specific tool name in title (ChatGPT, Canva, Midjourney, Adobe)
SECRET or HIDDEN or FREE angle

proven_high_performers: Text-to-3D tools (Luma, CSM, Meshy) - 461.73% proven (video_id: MNuKOhfrYNA)
avoid_based_on_data: Generic '3 AI Tools' titles - avg 22.3% (eSZXioT-K1I: 11.91%, lvo2n2-QNfc: 26.22%, AlwXQHXHjDQ: 27.69%)
Vague tools without names - 'TOP YouTubers Secret': 26.22% (video_id: lvo2n2-QNfc)
List formats - consistently underperform single tool focus
Generic productivity hacks - 'AI Hacks Giving You Back 10+ Hours': 27.69% (video_id: AlwXQHXHjDQ)
upcoming_tools_to_test: Sora (video generation) - test with visual transformation angle like Text-to-3D
Midjourney v7 (if released) - focus on SECRET parameters

AI hacks giving you back 10+ hours weekly (vague - 27.69%)
bullet_structure: Bullet 1: What the tool does and why it is SECRET/HIDDEN/FREE
Bullet 2: How to access it (step-by-step under 15 words)
Bullet 3: Specific result you get (with before/after proof)

visual_pacing.seconds_9_20: Tool demo (how to use it, 3-5 seconds per step)

must_include: Shock value or entertainment angle (not just news)

include: Game-changing AI announcements with clear demo

Security scares (Police Cameras HACKED: 49.55%, video_id: TZlsIjBgcEk)

title_formula.NEW_PROVEN_FORMAT: ChatGPT's SECRET [CATEGORY] Prompts: [SPECIFIC RESULT] in SECONDS!

must_include: Exact ChatGPT prompt (visible on screen, copy-paste ready)
Specific use case (email, code, writing, research)
must_avoid: Generic 'AI hacks' or '3 tips' format (proven 14.74% failure)
Lists of multiple prompts (focus on ONE per video)
content_requirements.posting_time: 21:00 UTC Thursday (4 PM EST) - same as Tool Teardown Thursday
content_requirements.recommended_action: IMMEDIATE PIVOT to specific ChatGPT prompt format BEFORE replacing Tool Teardown Thursday

bullet_requirements: Bullet 1: The exact prompt (visible on screen, copy-paste ready)
Bullet 3: Time saved (in SECONDS, with before/after comparison)

visual_requirements: ChatGPT interface screenshot with prompt visible
Highlight the exact prompt text for easy copying

ai_news_roundup.replacement: Viral AI Friday - Entertainment-focused stories that perform 80.69% (2.5x better)

what_we_learned.lesson_3: Saturday (66.53%) performs worse than Friday (77.63%) by 11.1%
what_we_learned.action_taken: Killed Saturday news, moved entertaining stories to Friday 23:00 UTC

migration_path.entertaining_news: Move to Viral AI Friday (Rizzbot, AWS Brain Rot, lawsuit drama)
migration_path.practical_news: Convert to Tool Teardown format (specific tool demos)
migration_path.generic_news: REJECT - does not fit any series

negative_news_framing.what_we_learned: Negative framing without resolution = low retention

saturday_morning_posts.reason: Saturday (66.53% day avg) + Morning (34.0% time avg) = underperformance
saturday_morning_posts.replaced_with: Friday (77.63% day avg) + Evening 23:00 UTC (82.1% time avg) = 80% expected

morning_posts_general.reason: 14:00-15:00 UTC (9-10 AM EST) = 34.0% completion across all content types
morning_posts_general.lesson: US audience (58.3%) watches YouTube evenings, NOT mornings
